about_the_game:
Music composition
Andrew Luers except as noted:

“Byzankar’s Might”
Andrew Luers and Azure Phoenix Studios

“The Flowstone Saga”
Andrew Luers and Steve Haverly

“Inquisitor”
Andrew Luers, Kat Felicis Ioco, and Steve Haverly

Choir and vocal arrangement
Kat Felicis Ioco
Andrew Luers

Additional arrangement
Azure Phoenix Studios
Doug Perry

Mixing / Mastering
Azure Phoenix Studios
Erik 'Viking Guitar' Peabody
Andrew Luers

Laura Intravia - Flute , recorder
Kristin Naigus - Oboe, English horn, Tin Whistle
John Stacy - Trumpet, Horn, Trombone
John Robert Matz - Trumpet
Michaela Nachtigall - Violin, viola
Tera Catallo (TeraC Music) - Viola
Brad Burr - Saxophone
Kat Felicis Ioco - Soprano Soloist
Alyssa Menes - Acoustic Guitar
Doug Perry - Percussion
Erik 'Viking Guitar' Peabody - Electric guitar
Andrew Luers - Electric and Nylon String Guitar, Bass, Saxophone, Piano
Anton Corazza - EWI

Choir
Kat Felicis Ioco
Deia Vengen
Robin Rubeo
Tera Catallo (TeraC Music)
Ryan Thompson
Jackson Byrne
Andrew Luers

name: Flowstone Saga Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 437 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2700 MB available space

short_description: The full, epic original soundtrack for Flowstone Saga, spanning over 70 tracks composed by Andrew Luers!
